mapper.insert: insert into fy_need_publish(publisher_id, publisher_name, need_title, need_description,publish_time) values (#{userId}, #{nickname}, #{title}, #{description}, #{publishTime});
mapper.select: select need_id needId, publisher_name publisherName, publisher_id publisherId, need_title title, comment_no commentNo, publish_time publishTime from fy_need_publish ORDER BY publish_time limit 8;
